item.title: Report E-2024120459
item.description:
Report E-2024120459

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-04
  • City: LA SALLE
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 06:00 EST, ERTS was contacted by XPO Logistics (XLA) about a cargo release. It was reported that due to a forklift puncture, approximately .5 gallon of Foodarom Caramel flavoring extract (hazardous - UN1197) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the dock floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product, damaged jug, and oil-dri will be placed into a 55-gallon metal drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release. There is no regulatory reporting required for this release.
